H0.text: What name was given to the eleven states that fought the Union in the US Civil War. Southern Alliance

H1.text: What name was given to the eleven states that fought the Union in the US Civil War. Rebel States of America

H2.text: What name was given to the eleven states that fought the Union in the US Civil War. United Southern States

H3.text: What name was given to the eleven states that fought the Union in the US Civil War. Confederacy

A4.text: The Confederate States of America was also known as the Confederacy
